title: Advent Calendar Update!
contents: ÔªøStarting TodayÔªø You will be able to start the game and be greeted with a warm holiday welcome...or rather cold in this case ÔªøÔªø We got a tiny new easter egg for you to enjoy and new warm music to chill to ÔªøÔªø you will also see a new button that once clicked will take you to our in game advent calendar !Ôªø You can go there daily and claim an exclusive advent calendar banana ! Ôªø These bananas will only be available during these 24 daysÔªø if you miss a day you will NOT be able to claim it afterwards so please be sure to collect them every day Ôªø Ôªø we have something small for the week of Christmas planned as well ÔªøÔªø sorry for the delay and happy holidays ÔªøÔªø

title: Autumn Season update
contents: We're a bit late but here is the Autumn drop pool update ! We'll be updating this more frequently and have this season overlap with the winter one to make up for it Common Added CleaningbrushnanaAdded Towelracknana Uncommon Added PaintsetnanaAdded MousepadnanaRare Added LicensenanaAdded WhalefinnanaUltrarare Added Bitingabanana Epic Added HappypixelnanaLegendary Added Bluescreennana

title: Patch Notes 13-11-2025 - Achievements in Exchange fix
contents: \Fixes issue on exchanges not being counted towards the achievement\Fixes issue on Mood Capsule Collection resulting in an error rather than giving a banana- The Banana Team

title: Patch Notes 05-11-2025 - Inventory w/ Exchange Optimization
contents: \Changes the animation for the Inventory to hide before the exchange appears.Removes hidden inventory when exchange is visible - This optimizes substantially CPU usage.\Fixes issue on some bananas not being able to be clicked.\NEW In-Game ItemShop]We've added the capsules to be purchasable in-game, where you can select between 1 and 20 to purchase from.\Removes some unnecessary files & folders that were cluttering the game (~250 MB reduction).\We know there's been issues with exchanging, where you try to exchange and then your items don't seem to get used OR there's too many errors on "Please try again later", we're working on it!- The Banana Team

title: Patch Notes 31-10-2025 - Exchange Mix Collections & % Fail
contents: \Added a new theme for halloweenAdded a new background music for halloweenUpdated every UI to match the halloween themeAdded tooltips for every button with a description of what it does, so people can learn what each thing does\Updated the full scene UI for a spooky vibe\Adds a new system that automatically fixes everyone's stacks if they exceed 60k quantityDeveloper Note: Since the Steamworks SDK only allows a "short" integer value for the quantity variable, we had unstack the items automatically to prevent some items of having negative values or overall wrong valuesFixes visualization on some bananas & items that would sometimes show a negative value"Show on market" button now opens within the Steam Overlay\Adds a limit of stacking items to 60 000 per stack. If a user has any item quantity that exceeds this value (more closer to 65 000) some quantities might appear wrong, so a restart in the game should fix it.\Updates the exchange system to utilize a % fail rate as follows:Normal -> Common = 75% Success rate & 25% fail rateCommon -> Uncommon = 80% Success rate & 20% fail rateUncommon -> Rare = 85% Success rate & 15% fail rateRare -> Epic = 90% Success rate & 10% fail rateEpic -> Ultra Rare = 95% Success rate & 5% fail rateUltra Rare -> Legendary = 100% Success rateAdds a new ability of using and mixing collections!!Note: Only bananas that drop can be traded up with other bananas that also drop. You cannot trade up dropped bananas with capsule bananas.\Fixes an issue that caused the drop timer to reset and stay in loop checking every 3 minutes after a person just got a drop.\Added the ability to press "ESC" button to go back in the menu's or to close them, to make it easier and faster to move around.\Fixes an issue where the drop pool list would duplicateFixes an issue where the drop pool list would not reopen after closing\Feedback button now opens within the Steam OverlayItem shop button now opens within the Steam Overlay\Workshop button now opens within the Steam Overlay\Adds a new Login Streaks feature (disabled in production)Adds a new Item Shop panel in-game (hidden for now)- The Banana Team

title: Spookfest 2025
contents: Banana Spookfest 2025!Happy (late) Halloween from everyone at Banana! The spookiest time of the year has returned and so have the cursed bananas... The game has been updated with everything you need to send chills down your spine and make your screen glow in eerie orange and purple.Prepare yourself for the Banana Spookfest 2025!What‚Äôs New In-Game?Full Halloween overhaul , dark, moody, and full of haunting details.New music to set the perfect creepy vibe.Spooky animationsA brand new welcome screen to greet you with spooky energy.Limited-Time Halloween BananasThis year, three new haunted bananas join the party!HauntedcemeterynanaDrops alongside your normal bananas for the next week only!HauntsiclenanaEmerging straight from the Well of the Past for a week while exchanging, don‚Äôt miss it!AutumnnanaA seasonal special, dropping naturally until the end of November alongside the normal drops!Once time‚Äôs up, they vanish like ghosts at dawn. BUT WAIT THERE IS MORE !Banana Carving Contest 2025: Nightmare Before Christmas EditionAlright‚Ä¶ we messed up the dates a little, but we‚Äôre turning it into something even better. Last year‚Äôs carving event started October 1st, this year, we‚Äôre fusing Halloween and Christmas into one!Starts: October 31stEnds: December 25thThat‚Äôs right, carve your bananas through the spooky season and into the holidays! more info about the carving event can be found in our discordWe are aware that people have been asking for the new season collection and we hear you, we're almost done with the Autumn one and have some new special goodies in place for everyone in the meantime :INFO ABOUT DAILY LOGIN STREAKS AND REWARDS SOON IN GAME! You read that right, daily login streaks and rewards will be added to the game soon, from then on if you log in to banana daily you are able to get free rewards on top of the already free daily drops , and for those who are dedicated there are even more surprises at the end of each week

title: Bugfixes & Unity Vulnerability Patch (CVE-2025-59489)
contents: - Updated Unity version to the latest, to fix the latest caught vulnerability - More Info - Updates the Collections Tab visuals - Fixes issue on collections tab not opening a second time after opening once - Fixes drop pool list - Fixes issues on closing the game on linux, making the game non-responsive - The Banana Team

title: Summer 2025 Activated
contents: Pfew that took a while. Goodbye Spring 2025 collection and Hello Summer 2025 Collection Spring 2025 has been enabled to be exchangeable in the inventory. Have fun going through the tiers and getting those legendary bananas. We have also DISABLED all Normal>Common exchanges from previous collections in the inventory, up to 1 previous collection (in this case Spring) if you want older obtainable ones we wish you luck in the well of the past. So what is new or to be expected later this Season? : - Fail % chance on INVENTORY exchanges - Log In Streaks and rewards - Global Leaderboard - New Capsule - Redeemable Codes for exclusive bananas!

title: Gathering Feedback and Suggestions
contents: From now on all suggestions will be done and looked at via https://feedback.banana.game/ Keep it English, Vote for features you'd like to see first and add suggestions as you please. discuss in the comments and let's move banana forward together Thank you.

title: Well Drop Chances Update & New Drop Pool Update üçå
contents: We have great news! You can now use commons to change for gold. We also changes the percentages on the Well of the Past! Check out the new ones: OLD > NEW: 1 Gold: -90% > 80% = 1 Normal -8.89% > 17.78% = 1 Random Common -1% > 2% = 1 Random Uncommon -0.10% > 0.20% = 1 Random Rare -0.01% > 0.02% = 1 Random Epic 10 Gold: -90% > 80% = 1 Normal -8.89% > 17.78% = 5 Random Commons OR 1 Random Uncommon -1% > 2% = 1 Random Rare -0.10% > 0.20% = 1 Random Epic 100 Gold: -90% > 80% = 100 Normals -8.70% > 17.40% = 1 Random Rare -1.2% > 2.4% = 2 Random Rare OR 5 Random Rares -0.10% > 0.20% = 5 Random Epic Banana Drop Pool Alert! A new update on Drop Pool just arrived! And it's looking really juicy. Meet Spitfirenana mk01 and F1nana. Will you have the fortune to earn them? - Added F1nana - Updated info panel description to match with the changed %'s

title: New Update: Capsules Are Here! üçå
contents: We‚Äôre excited to announce a brand-new update! Capsules are now available in the Item Store and it's a way to increase your banana collection. Each capsule holds a surprise banana‚Äîfrom uncommon to legendary. How It Works:Head to the Item StoreBuy your CapsulesOpen them up in your inventory and see what fortune you got! Each capsule is a chance to score different types of bananas that help you grow your banana collection.Are you ready? Get your Capsules, Banana Clickers, and start opening today!Added bannersFixes a rare case where the refresh button was not workingUpdates Menu IconAdded Quit button (finally!)Fixes collection countingRedirects statistics to Datanana APIUpdates some visual animations to match the moving animationAdded option to convert Commons into GoldAdded new panel to choose which Commons to convert into GoldAlso has a toggle Max to insert all of the maximum available bananasFixes a rare case where sometimes the converting of bananas into Gold would return 0 GoldFixes issue on some progress not being storedFixes some issues on calories and other clicks not storing properly

title: Known Bugs in Banana - We‚Äôre Working on Fixes! üçå
contents: Hey, Banana Clickers! We want to quickly address two bugs that we‚Äôre aware of: Builder Reset Bug: In some cases, purchased builders are resetting unexpectedly, causing players to lose progress on their builders. We're investigating this and working on a fix! Stack Value Issue: When stacking items, if the total value exceeds around 60,000, restarting the game can cause the value to appear incorrectly. We‚Äôre on this one too and will have a fix soon. We apologize for the trouble these bugs may have caused. The team is already working hard to resolve them, and we‚Äôll update you as soon as the issues are fixed.Thanks for your patience and support!

title: Bugfixes & New Drop List
contents: Hello Everyone! Today we have a bit of changes to the game, some QoL (Quality Of Life) changes. Added rarity color and name on the resulting bananas Fixes "Slender" Monkey issue - in some instances when going into the WellOfThePast it would flicker black and a monkey in it Added tooltips explaining what each section of the Well does, 1 for the Sage Monkey and 1 for the Wishing Well (it also states the %'s) Updates some animations Added option to trade 10k Normal bananas and 100k Normal Bananas into gold (to make it faster for bigger wales) Fixes issue on Exchanging, in some cases it would not work, due to a conflict with Gold Fixes issue on not being able to remove selected items on Exchnaging Fixes issue on not being able to continuing to exchange after an error was thrown, something like "not enough normal bananas" Removes empty square (Gold) from the view Fixes issue on some descriptions would overflow Fixes issue on some buttons not aligning properly Adds magnifying glass on item view to view the full Selected banana skin Adds option to delete "Free Ultra Rare Christmas Token" and other similar tokens (asked by a lot of people) Fixes issue on not being able to delete items Fixes issue on the popup message not being able to close Fixes some issues with visualization of some tooltips Adds separate volume bars for SFX, Music & Master NEW Drop List] Adds new Drop List in-game(inside the phone) Note: if you hover each banana it'll tell you what's their % of dropping Re-enabled the event exchange Fixes issue on, again, Helicopternana being swapped with Submarinenana - The Banana Team

title: Hotfixes - 24-04-2025
contents: Hello Bananas! Today we have another batch of hotfixes, freshly out of the hoven. Fixed issue on items not being able to remove from the Inventory Exchange system manually, before you'd have to click "Cancel" to remove all of them Updates the text of the "type"/origin inside the inventory item view, from "O" to "Original", "S" to "Store" and "E" to "Exchanged" Enables window resizing again, and locks the resizing to 16:9 aspect ratio, you can freely resize again! Fixes issue on the game not saving the latest resolution changed Fixes issue on the sound not scalling properly Removes placeholder name for empty notification when getting a banana that was "Sad Hasmter Banana" Fixes issue on some cases where the buttons of the Inventory and The Well Of The Past would not appear - The Banana Team

title: Resolution & Scalling - Hotfixes - 23-04-2025
contents: Fixes issue on scaling resolution Fixes issue on fullscreen toggle not working Fixes issue on changing resolutions not working Adds resolutions that fit the 16:9 aspect ratio Disables manual resizing (for the time being) - The Banana Team

title: Bananaversery!! And More..
contents: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/dc566272d7d1ca48cc16d06614f24eebee29dec9.png üçå Happy Bananaversary! üçå Big Things Are Coming in Banana! It's been a whole year of chaotic clicks, legendary drops, and a community that went completely... bananas. To celebrate, we're rolling out our biggest update ever ‚Äî and trust us, it's a-peel-ing. üçå What's New? Brace yourself for a fresh batch of updates. New Gameplay Features Builders & Upgrades ‚Äì Automate your banana gameplay. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/6094f281d9ff04d186afac5804ffa05ea82e6a21.png The Well of the Past & The Sage Monkey ‚Äì Exchange bananas for gold, and gold for older collection bananas. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/bb38179797f7b8b63e05e1980bc66a11addcd270.png {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/424837d74ba6e382fe80c972941d8c5077e8ce09.png Achievements - Made by Min {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/ca7b6e30ae8dc7e9249966924a078c47dd4da77d.png Revamped UI & Logo - Made by Adolfo and Deko {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/748ac10d74529d9658ac0a82896fc2f38a05d224.png {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/7fd17395bc919bd73898c8c63b6ab2e6c09a3ccf.png New music and tunes to listen to made by Bolt Action Music The Well of the Past Has Opened! For now, only Normal bananas can be exchanged into Gold to try your luck in the Well of the Past ‚Äî a mysterious place where forgotten bananas resurface. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/3f6ad784a8888c1a0286ab2315b8f6a245c63163.png Inside the well, you‚Äôll find almost everything Banana has ever offered regarding previous seasonal collections : üå∏ Spring ‚òÄÔ∏è Summer üçÇ Autumn ‚ùÑÔ∏è Winter Except for: - Store bananas - Event bananas - Festive bananas But wait ‚Äî there's more. For the first month only, we‚Äôre enabling a 10% chance to drop a banana from Legacy 1 or Legacy 2 collections ‚Äî giving everyone a fair shot at those collections once again. So start exchanging and Goodluck The past might just bless your future üçå For 1 month long you will also have a chance to get the Epic Birthdaybanana from the Well only {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/20432a2ccb374049880c88e02e69a4558b6e64fb.png These have about a 0.01-0.1% chance of dropping, so goodluck üçå Coming Soon... Our dev monkeys are working overtime on even more juicy features: - Floats & Patterns - Cases - Log-In Streaks - Quests, Puzzles & Minigames - Prestige System & Prestige Shop - Gold Shop - 3D Banana World? üëÄ üíõ Thank You From the bottom of our banana hearts, thank you for an amazing year. You're not just players ‚Äî you're peelers, collectors, traders, memers, and friends. This is only the beginning.

title: BADGES AND TRADING CARDS!
contents: GOOD NEWS EVERYONE ! We finally have our very own TRADING CARDS and BADGES !! And we all know what that means, we finally have our very own BACKGROUNDS and EMOTES now available as well {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/db5b4ab5df03fdc983c0ae6dde1d0c4fe69d6a29.png 5 Trading cards : To.... Trade with... ( and level up on steam itself of course!) Galaxynana Picklenana Sad hamsternana Skynana Spartanana TRADING CARDS ALSO HAVE A FOIL VERSION 6 Relaxing badges To show off to your friends! LEVEL 1: Noodle Jr. (a play on Sky's dog and My Snake) LEVEL 2: Bananorama (one of our favorite shows) LEVEL 3: Peeling is my life (For who's isn't it at this point) LEVEL 4: Veteran Peeler ( You've been here from the start) LEVEL 5: VACation BANana ( Poking fun at those praying on our downfall) FOIL : Bananiac (The golden version of the VACation BANana, only to those crazy enough about us to get this) 6 Backgrounds To decorate those Banana influenced profiles even more! Bananachan (We all love Banana Chan) - rare Bananatone (Simple yet satisfying) - common Manynana (Sky's Pashion is Grafhiks) - common Clicknanas (Please stop clicking it, he's in pain) - common Cloudfishingnana ( Just a chill banana, like most of us here) - uncommon UFOnanas ( They're coming for us) - uncommon 9 EMOTES To spice up steam chat and spread the word of banana! BananaA (letter A) - common BananaB (letter B) - common BananaN (letter N) - common Musicnana ( We all love music) - common Onlybanana (The only one) - common Goldenbanana ( The golden banana) - uncommon Diamondnana ( The Diamond banana) - rare Skyliner ( Sky's Lightning personality strikes again ) - rare Aestheticspartan ( Look mom i'm in a game) - rare

title: That Banana clicker game is somehow still one of Steam's most-played games, with 100K+ concurrents seeing it consistently outranking the likes of Call of Duty and Helldivers 2
contents: Last year we reported on a phenomenon that, frankly, left PC Gamer's editorial team a little baffled . We were in one of our morning meetings when someone shared Banana, a free-to-play game available on Steam where you click on an image of a banana, but what was mind-blowing were the player counts. This was in May 2024 and, at the time, tens of thousands of players were just‚Ä¶ clicking away on bananas... Read more.

title: Christmas Update & Upcoming Sneak Peek
contents: Happy Holidays Everyone! For this years Holidays and Christmas event we have changed the in game theme to fit the winter vibe. We are also introducing a new system which we would like YOUR feedback on for future like wise events. Introducing: the event exchange system! First of all EVERYONE gets a free Ultra Rare token this can not be traded or sold and are to be used in the exchange. The tokens you buy from the item shop are tradeable and marketable. When launching the game you will see a new button in the top right next to the others called Event Exchange. If you click this button a new menu will open where you will receive two options: Option A: Ultra Rare Exchange Option B: Legendary Exchange {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/92aa354e22daa22afd605ad2fc739d39f712c9f6.png Option A: Costs 350 Normal bananas and 1 Ultra Rare Token Gets you the Ultra Rare Christmas Treenana 1 Ultra Rare token can be bought from the item store {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/d9f9fb55b02842396346e68ceafa27d65a1cea64.png Option B: Costs 3500 Normal bananas and 1 Legendary Token Gets you the Legendary Christmas Bananachan Legendary token can be bought from the item store You are NOT ABLE to get these any other way. CHRISTMAS DROPS: These will be dropping alongside your standard drops!! Common: Candycanenana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/59e06127a778a55a0824d27957f32a2c2c151b86.gif Giftnana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/7311b25373118b71a827e0cf6b85142b88678e62.png Santanana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/dd817925bc40b47cce7090b5d56d5329c80f9f2a.png Uncommon: Cookienana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/fe78ffbc390d6c0d78766108c39683c67465f5b6.png Wafflenana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/2a8877861f960060a3a2750e9b3b17cf23733c11.png Gingerbreadnana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/168531c3bc87c05b0c21498e486e2e254a351287.png Snowmanana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/2af65208c61fb17a7442783336158f145e7099f4.png Rare: Christmaslightnana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/f0e805ceb4806c97d2550f8967e20b10f042384d.gif Ornamentnana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/39d487dadc06be02c57a3efe5356c77f324e28cd.gif Bananasnowman {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/99197d6a068ad44b33298cff75df7481d5cfdfcb.gif Epic: Santabeltnana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/ba2c92caf7cd02128a421a58547a646ea7d6bbac.gif Christmascandynana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/6485d99d45ba513587e5b8f9a3ab670e4615082b.gif Happysnownana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/4a97ea4975a1dcca6d7488cecd65897cbba6758d.gif ITEM STORE UPDATE Subzeronana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/ab221ab343aef12e4ed7a7b227492a841493b04b.gif Cryonana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/f470a44ee3e1981a2c0efb9969b0dae0813d129d.gif Jollygingerbreadnana {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/9319df542c8f91ccbe08980f462d80ec21df617f.gif Ultra Rare Token {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/9d2950c8463fee94d8530c02f81e939a5246b4e3.png {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/45a0a675943b7770550ed25bdf0594ca6c5adc61.gif Legendary Token {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/85d68c50503a45245f353014e0ecc83d1e1883d8.png {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/9d75c54e10b9b7e62b40e2daa163479275a0fff0.gif You will also see NEW ACHIEVEMENTS These are NOT ENABLED yet since we need to do some finetuning on them! title: Hotfix QoL Update
contents: Fixes issue on exchange system freezing after adding 10 bananas

title: QoL Update
contents: Hello Bananas! QoL Changes Today we have some changes regarding QoL (Quality Of Life) changes. That makes it easier to spot different types of bananas inside the game, search and filter them out as well. (The filter does not save between game sessions) Oh and we've updated the game to reduce the storage usage! (Unninstalling & installing is recommended!) Normal Bananas - The Huge Quantity So, we've been seeing, for a while, that the normal banana quantity is still increasing, really fast. So, we're gonna give it another purpose within the game to make it useful and clean some inventories. (BTW! There's a delete button if you think you have too many of any banana, you can delete them from your inventory!) We're changing the usage of the exchanging system to add the requirement of an X amount of normal bananas per rarity of which it's exchanging to, to simplify here's how it goes: Exchange System Update: 10 x Normal > Common - No Change 10 x Common + 2 Normal > Uncommon 10 x Uncommon + 4 Normal > Rare 10 x Rare + 8 Normal > Epic 10 x Epic + 16 Normal > Ultra Rare 10 x Ultra Rare + 32 Normal > Legendary Color Explanation: (Light Green = New) Change Notes: Added a new background (what might this mean?) Added a line to differentiate the rarities between bananas Added an icon to differentiate between the "O"riginal, "E"xchanged and "S"tore/Item Store bananas Added Search Bar, to find the bananas inside your inventory Added filters, to filter out whatever you wanna filter out Added "Total Items" label, to tell you how many bananas in total you have Added "Selected" label, when you click "Select for Stack", to tell you how many bananas in total you have selected Added a "Show In Market" button on the info panel Added "Total Items" label, to tell you how many bananas in total you have that are eligible to exchange Updated the "Exchange" button, to tell you how many Normal Bananas it requires for the specific exchange Added a popup error message when a user does not have enough normal bananas to exchange - The Banana Team

Added new Halloween 2024 Collection and its bananas Notes: We're working on reducing the file size on the next big update! - The Banana Team

title: Banana Drop Pool Update & Answering a Stacking Question
contents: Hello Bananas! Before we release more Autumn 2024 Collection bananas we're updating the drop chance for the bananas. Why? A: From our calculations, if we kept the same drop chances, it would increase the higher rarity bananas' number, which would decrease their actual value. The more there are the less value they have, and that's the opposite of what we want. Why only now? A: Only now we have an idea of the number of bananas that can be created and we have more statistics on what can happen. And with the exchange system, it will go down more smoothly in terms of bananas not circulating (being exchange into higher rarities). So here are the new drop chances! (Old > New) Normal - 54% > 70% Common - 30% > 25% Uncommon - 10% > 4.89% Rare - 4% > 0.1% Epic - 2% > 0.01% Ultra Rare - 1 in 4 000 000 > 1 in 400 000 Legendary - 1 in 28 000 000 > 1 in 10 000 000 What stacking question? We noticed there's been some confusion with the exchange system and exchanged bananas, so we'll try to clear it up as much as possible - sorry if it‚Äôs caused any confusion! Any banana you get from the exchange system will have the "Origin Exchanged" tag. Whether you use exchanged or dropped bananas, the result will always be an "Exchanged" banana. Pretty straightforward, right? Now, a few of you pointed out that exchanged bananas aren‚Äôt stacking with dropped bananas. We‚Äôre working on a way to visually show the difference between dropped and exchanged bananas. Here‚Äôs why that matters: Some people have spent serious cash on their dropped bananas, and now the same ones can pop up from exchanges We want to make sure that if you own a dropped banana, you can still flex your original, earned version. (There's gonna be a visual difference that will not impact how the banana itself looks, more so as a colored symbol/text in the tags section when you hover over the banana in the market that kind of "jumps" in your sight so you really can't miss it and also in-game and inventory there will be this slight visual indicator) - The Banana Team

title: Release Notes 16-10-2024
contents: Fixes issue on tokens appearing when starting the game the first time (might also fix issue on exchanging not working) Adds back trigger items on click, so people can click and get the 300 tokens instead of going "oh i did not get anything" on launch

title: Banana Exchange System
contents: Hello bananas! After hard work and some ideas thrown back and forth we've come up with the Exchange System! We have a bunch of more update to tell you about, so keep on reading! Collections We've added 4 Collections: Legacy 1 (From the start of the game until around mid may) Legacy 2 (From around mid may until mid june or july) Summer 2024 (From mid june/july until September 21st 2024) Autumn 2024 (From September 21st 2024 to ) (Autumn 2024 Collection isn't included here yet because it's not yet complete!) {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/84ea7930415bc722d5254cf3ad32d965a2554476.png 1 Collection lasts/is built during 3 months*. *The common bananas will be used to exchange into the current collections (right now Summer & Autumn) afterwards, only the bananas within the same collection can be used (e.g. Common into Uncommon, and Uncommon into Rares, and so on). We're looking into making the exchange system dynamic, E.g. 5 bananas from Legacy 1 + 5 bananas from Legacy 2 = 50% legacy 1 and 50% legacy 2 result. Legacy 1 & 2 were made from the first 2-3 months of bananas between them. We've tried to make them the same amount of rarities. Sounds We've added some sounds to the game, so it doesn't sound like it's just dead when you're using it: Clicking sounds Entering Menus (Inventory & Settings) Exchange System Sound (Animation) Exchange System! {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/8c724317cfb0287bf2abe5a8d61d276e5fd168e8.gif We've added the asked exchange system/trade up system, to be able to use lower tier bananas into higher tier bananas. Right now you'll need 10 of the lower tiered bananas to upgrade into 1 of the higher tier banana. BUT to prevent people (mainly "oilers") from spamming and gaining a lot of higher tiered bananas we've found a way to prevent that spam, with TOKENS! Tokens {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/4aec3b5511658238dc296048d277334ef97900b2.png For every exchange ABOVE normal, so common > uncommon, uncommon > rare (and so on), you'll require 1 token per exchange. So, requirements will be 1 token + 10 bananas (common, uncommon, rare, epic, ultra rare or legendary) Everyone will get 300 tokens for free at the start!! Afterwards you'll keep getting around 8 per week OR you can buy them in the item shop! Why Tokens? We do this for two reasons: This makes it more fair for the people who recently started buying and people who will be buying new bananas to exchange as the trade & market-lock, from purchasing those, also goes over into the stacked or exchanged bananas anyway. This way EVERYONE is tied to 8 tradeups in a week and 7 days trade & market-lock after exchange, the only thing you can "bypass" if you so need to/want to is by buying more exchange tokens from our item store, you can look at them as some form of tiny keys. Examples: 1 token + 10 Normal bananas = 1 Common Summer 2024 or Autumn 2024 Collection Banana 1 token + 10 Uncommon bananas = 1 Rare Summer 2024 or Autumn 2024 Collection Banana 1 token + 10 Rare Bananas Legacy 1 = 1 Epic Legacy 1 Collection Banana Change Notes: Overhauls the integration system with steamworks Updates stack & unstacking system to make them more responsive & work better Adds new sounds (clicking, opening and closing menu, exchange animation) Adds new volume option to the settings Menu, also saves between gameplay sessions Removes triggering item drop on clicking, which causes some players to recieve rate limits Adds new stacking system & loading screen Adds new unstacking system & loading screen Adds number of selected bananas when selecting for stacking Adds button to refresh inventory, limited once per minute Adds token input, to show how many you have * The exchange token numbers are subject to change. - The Banana Team

We missed our other milestones due to other focuses but as a way to make it up for that, we are going to add 3 different bananas for this event! *1 million Jester Banana to the common pool ü™Ö *5 million Knight Banana to the common pool ‚öîÔ∏è *10 million King Banana to the rare pool üëë Thank you all so much for supporting and helping us reach this amazing number. We are working very hard to push out more content ü´Ç and updates for you all, more on that later. This event will be a limited time event and starting now you will be able to get all 3 of these bananas in the drop pool, good luck!

title: Drop Pool Update!
contents: Hello @Bananas We've made an update to the drop system! Previously we had 2 drop pools, where in 1 of them you could only get commons or normals, called the "Common Drop Pool". And one of the you could get a rare with a chance of a higher rarity banana, called the "Rare Drop Pool". BUT, since the "rare" drop pool wasn't actually "rare", everyone would either get one or a ultra rare or legendary, we've updated the drop system to ACTUALLY use %'s but, in 1 drop pool only! So, the NEWLY UPDATED DROP POOL with PERCENTAGES WOO! Removed 18 hour drop pool Updated 3 hour drop pool to the following*: 58% Normal 34% Common 8% or to be exact 7.999999714285% ~ Rare 1/4 000 000 Ultra Rare 1/28 000 000 Legendary Good luck! :wink: * Subject to change

title: Pandanana Bug
contents: There is a confirmed bug on the Steam market regarding the Pandanana. Please do not buy the expensive version of the item as it will revert to the not-so-expensive version of the item after it goes off trade cooldown. A name change caused there to be two versions of it on the market, and the one before the change is still listed, hence the crazy prices. Again, please do not buy the expensive version. Wrong version : {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/8cbe16073acf5c155a9d4cf9d665b07c831b2a4b.png Right version : {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44970814/716202bd35b95e0feb9c7456133d5dd421bde344.png we're looking for a way to revert this

title: Future updates!
contents: Hello everyone! Sorry for the low annoucements/up-to-dates recently, but we've been working on some fixes that are taking longer than expected. Current Bugs To keep everyone up with what we're doing, we're still tweaking the memory issue at the moment, we've found a solution already, but it's still not 100% how we wanted so, you gotta wait a bit longer. This also means that the newest bananas will only get added once we've fixed that issue. Future features Crafting..? We're also moving forward with CRAFTING!/Tradeups/"Peeling the banana" (we still haven't figured out 100% how we're gonna call it). The numbers are not set in stone 100% but we'll be updating you guys whenever it gets released. Drop Pool Changes Changing the drop pool system, nowadays we have 2 drop pools active, 1 that drops commons every 3 hours and 1 that drops rares and more than rares every 18 hours, and we want to change that and add everything to one drop pool! Adding.. cases..? But also, change the item that is dropped into a case, where you can either keep the case, open it, or just sell it! There's no necessity purchasing anything, since you'll be able to craft your own as well with the common bananas, so that the amount of bananas that are circulating can also be decreased, giving a purpose to the common bananas! We'll have a bunch of new images and sketches to explain how this system properly works rather than just text. For now that's all we have for you! Best Regards, - Sky

title: The game about clicking a banana finally keeps track of how many times you click the banana
contents: Banana is a game about clicking on a banana. That's literally it: There's a picture of a banana, and you click on it. Somehow, it's tremendously popular—it's currently the third-most played game on Steam, and I will provide a picture to prove it. But it's been lacking in one vital feature: It did not keep track of how many times you actually clicked on the damn banana... Read more.

title: OMG An Update?
contents: Hello Everyone! Damn, an update you ask? Yes! (Finally :P) We've been working on these updates for the past weeks and preparing the game for future updates as well, trying to restructure & learn at the same time how things work. I hope you guys like it, and any type of constructive feedback is welcome! Updates: Added saving progress The big number on screen now saves Added Inventory system Added Delete button on inventory If a banana is stacked you can only delete from that stack Added Equip button (Also saves between sessions) Added workshop system Inside settings there's a button called "Upload Workshop Items" where you can upload your own banana into the workshop system! And there the community can vote on your banana & IF it gets accepted into the game, you can also make some revenue from it! Known issues: Not stacked items can only be deleted one at a time Deleting an item resets your equiped skin Scroll wheel needs tweaking

title: Banana Collaboration Event
contents: Hello Everyone! We're starting a new event giving away 1 legendary banana every day, for 69 days (nice)!! This event will last, well, the 69 days, if you wanna join in, and have a chance on extra items (more goodies) on this event, join our discord!! Discord - https://discord.gg/thebananas

title: Dev promises that Steam sensation Banana has 'no scamming', after fellow dev's shady faux-Bitcoin past sees his fruits confiscated
contents: Banana is one of the funniest things I've had the pleasure of reporting on‚Äîit's a game that seems to have started as a joke, but has rapidly skyrocketed to a high throne on the Steam pantheon, becoming the second most-played game on the platform, beaten only by Counter Strike 2... Read more.

title: Fine, let's write about the stupid Banana game
contents: You might have noticed that the second most played game on Steam right now is Banana, which released back in April, but has seen an explosion of popularity over the past couple of weeks. What is Banana? It's a free idle clicker in which you click on a picture of a banana to make numbers go up. If the number goes up enough, the game drops additional pictures of bananas into your Steam inventory. Actually, it's not even an idle clicker - simply leaving the game open all day is enough to generate a slow but steady supply of these banana pictures. Read more

title: The two most-played games on Steam today are Counter-Strike 2 and this game where you click a banana
contents: Banana is a game where you repeatedly click on a banana, and that's about it. If that sounds dull, it is: I downloaded Banana and clicked the banana for a while, and that's pretty much all there is to do... Read more.

title: Recent Changes
contents: Hello everyone, I believe you've noticed recently we've been changing some images from some bananas to something different. We're reviewing all the bananas that are public, because things blew up faster than any of us could dream off and we are taking this very seriously, we have 3 artists working on the new re-designs, and we will be extra cautious and strict about what we allow to be uploaded in the future. We apologise for any inconvenience. - The Banana Team

title: Banana peaks at 917k players
contents: Banana has peaked at 917,272 concurrent players on 20 June 2024 which is 58 days after release. View charts and more statistics on our website.

title: Establishing a Chinese Community
contents: Change news to Chinese (simplified) to read the update

title: Patch notes
contents: Added bot idling prevention Now you need to click 1 (once) every 3 hours to get a drop (or once every 18 hours for the rare drop) Added settings icon Added option to change resolutions Added option to fullscreen with the selected resolution Added discord link icon Updated shop icon & text Datanana phase 1

title: New Discord Invite Link!
contents: Hello everyone! Thanks to all of you who boosted the discord server, we now have a discord custom invite link!! Join up! - https://discord.gg/thebananas

title: Update
contents: Removes validation that checks if a user should get a drop every frame update Adds drop validation/checks together Adds check to only check validations every hour Updates max integer to ulong to have max number of 18,446,744,073,709,551,615 Updates number text to be centered rather than a little to the right game now runs in the background
